hero.description: Full Stack Developer passionate about transforming ideas into memorable digital experiences. With a keen eye for design and performance, I create solutions that not only work, but delight
about.title: About me
about.description.first: With over 3 years of experience in web development, I specialized in creating robust and scalable applications. My journey began with a passion for solving complex problems and evolved into a career dedicated to building exceptional digital experiences.
about.description.second: Currently, I am a full stack developer, with a primary focus on creating high-performance web solutions. I have experience with technologies such as Vue.js, React, React-Native, Node.js and Java, among others.
about.description.third: I am a lifelong learner, always attentive to the latest trends and best practices in the industry. I believe in the power of technology to transform businesses and lives, and this is my greatest daily motivation.
social.title: Social Links
